vcf_merge

vcf_merge.Rd

merge two vcf; merge second vcf into first one

Usage

vcf_merge(vcf, vcf1)

Arguments

vcf

-> vcfR object

vcf1

-> vcfR object

Value

augmented vcfR object

Details

This function adds all individuals from a second vcfR object into a first vcfR object, returning new vcfR object

Author

Tomas Hrbek October 2023

Examples

vcf_merge(vcf = my_vcf, vcf1 = other_vcf)
#> Error: object 'my_vcf' not found
vcf_merge(my_vcf, other_vcf)
#> Error: object 'my_vcf' not found
